text: Lonnie Hepburn (born May 12, 1949) is a former American football defensive back. He played for the Baltimore Colts from 1971 to 1972 and for the Denver Broncos in 1974. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American football defensive backs Category:Texas Southern Tigers football players Category:Baltimore Colts players Category:Denver Broncos players
title: Lonnie Hepburn
